name: jewelry-store_get_all_products
description:
Get all jewelry products, optionally filtered by category and/or material.

Args:
    category: Filter by category (Rings, Necklaces, Earrings, Bracelets, Watches)
    material: Filter by material (Gold, White Gold, Rose Gold, Platinum, Silver)
    limit: Maximum number of products to return (default: 100)

Returns:
    List of products with details including price, gemstone, and carat weight

name: jewelry-store_get_product_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific jewelry product.

Args:
    product_id: The unique product identifier (e.g., 'JWL-001')

Returns:
    Product details including dimensions, engravability, and specifications

name: jewelry-store_search_products
description:
Search jewelry products with multiple filters.

Args:
    query: Search term for name/description
    category: Filter by category (Rings, Necklaces, Earrings, Bracelets, Watches)
    material: Filter by material (Gold, White Gold, Rose Gold, Platinum, Silver)
    gemstone: Filter by gemstone (Diamond, Ruby, Emerald, Sapphire, Pearl)
    min_price: Minimum price filter
    max_price: Maximum price filter
    in_stock_only: Only show in-stock items
    limit: Maximum results (default: 20)

Returns:
    List of matching products

name: jewelry-store_get_categories
description:
Get all jewelry categories.

Returns:
    List of category names (Rings, Necklaces, Earrings, Bracelets, Watches)

name: jewelry-store_get_materials
description:
Get all available jewelry materials.

Returns:
    List of material names (Gold, White Gold, Rose Gold, Platinum, Silver, etc.)

name: jewelry-store_get_ring_sizes
description:
Get ring size guide with measurements.

Returns:
    List of ring sizes with diameter and circumference in mm

name: jewelry-store_check_engraving_options
description:
Check if a product can be engraved and get available options.

Args:
    product_id: The product to check for engraving eligibility

Returns:
    Engraving options including font styles, positions, max characters, and price

name: jewelry-store_preview_engraving
description:
Preview an engraving before adding it.

Args:
    product_id: The product to engrave
    text: The text to engrave (max 25 characters)
    font_style: Font style (Classic, Script, Modern, Block)

Returns:
    Preview details including character count and price

name: jewelry-store_add_engraving
description:
Add a custom engraving to a product.

Args:
    product_id: The product to engrave
    text: The text to engrave (max 25 characters)
    font_style: Font style (Classic, Script, Modern, Block)
    position: Engraving position (Inside, Outside, Back)

Returns:
    Engraving confirmation with ID for use when adding to cart

name: jewelry-store_get_gift_options
description:
Get all available gift wrapping and packaging options.

Returns:
    List of gift options with prices and descriptions

name: jewelry-store_add_to_cart
description:
Add a jewelry item to the shopping cart.

Args:
    product_id: The product to add
    quantity: Number of items (default: 1)
    size: Ring size if applicable
    engraving_id: ID from add_engraving if custom engraving was added
    gift_option_id: Gift option ID for special packaging

Returns:
    Confirmation of item added to cart

name: jewelry-store_get_cart
description:
Get the current shopping cart contents.

Returns:
    Cart items with prices, engravings, gift options, and totals

name: jewelry-store_clear_cart
description:
Remove all items from the shopping cart.

Returns:
    Confirmation that cart was cleared

name: jewelry-store_checkout
description:
Complete the purchase of all items in cart.

Creates an order, decreases stock, and clears the cart.

Returns:
    Order confirmation with order ID and total

name: jewelry-store_get_purchase_history
description:
Get the customer's order history.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of orders to return (default: 20)

Returns:
    List of past orders with items and details

name: jewelry-store_get_current_user
description:
Get the currently logged-in customer's information.

Returns:
    User details including name, email, phone, and default shipping address
